faithful.name: Faithful
faithful.description: Religious and spiritual hunters who draw strength from belief and faith. They see the Hunt as a sacred calling.
faithful.philosophy: Faith is our shield and our weapon. We hunt not from hate, but from duty to protect the innocent.

inquisitive.name: Inquisitive
inquisitive.description: Researchers, scientists, and investigators who approach the supernatural analytically. Knowledge is their greatest weapon.
inquisitive.philosophy: Understanding our enemy is the first step to defeating them. We hunt with information and preparation.

martial.name: Martial
martial.description: Soldiers, law enforcement, and fighters who confront supernatural threats with direct force and tactical expertise.
martial.philosophy: When diplomacy fails, we stand ready. Superior firepower and training win hunts.

entrepreneurial.name: Entrepreneurial
entrepreneurial.description: Networkers, fixers, and resource managers who leverage connections and capital against supernatural threats.
entrepreneurial.philosophy: Everything has a price, and we know how to pay it. Resources and contacts are as deadly as bullets.

underground.name: Underground
underground.description: Street-level survivors, criminals, and outcasts who fight supernatural threats from society's shadows.
underground.philosophy: The system failed us, so we hunt alone. Survival and cunning are our edges.

atonement.name: Atonement
atonement.description: You hunt to make up for past sins or failures. Every monster you stop is a step toward redemption.

justice.name: Justice
justice.description: You hunt to protect the innocent and punish the guilty. The law may fail, but you won't.

legacy.name: Legacy
legacy.description: You hunt to leave the world better than you found it. Your deeds will outlive you.

pride.name: Pride
pride.description: You hunt to prove your superiority. You're the apex predator, and monsters should fear you.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: You hunt because they took something from you. Every kill brings you closer to settling the score.

skill_descriptions.insight: Read people and situations, detect lies, understand motivations
skill_descriptions.medicine: Treat wounds, diagnose conditions, understand biology
skill_descriptions.occult: Knowledge of supernatural lore, rituals, and hidden truths
skill_descriptions.academics: Formal education, research skills, theoretical knowledge
skill_descriptions.investigation: Gather clues, follow leads, solve mysteries
skill_descriptions.science: Scientific method, empirical analysis, technical understanding
skill_descriptions.brawl: Hand-to-hand combat, grappling, close quarters fighting
skill_descriptions.firearms: Shooting, gun maintenance, tactical firearm use
skill_descriptions.streetwise: Urban survival, criminal contacts, black market
skill_descriptions.larceny: Lockpicking, breaking and entering, theft skills
